OpenAI’s latest update — the Responses API — made creating powerful AI-driven apps even easier. Think of this as the next step forward in building smarter applications.

What’s Special About the Responses API?

If you’ve already built applications using OpenAI’s Chat Completions API, you’re familiar with creating responsive chatbots. Now, with the Responses API, everything becomes simpler — and more powerful. Here’s how:

Quick Code Example: Chat Completions vs. Responses API

Here’s how easy it is to switch from Chat Completions to Responses API:

Chat Completions

# --------------------------------------------------------------
# Basic text example with the Chat Completions API
# --------------------------------------------------------------

response = client.chat.completions.create(
    model="gpt-4o-mini",
    messages=[
        {
            "role": "user",
            "content": "Write a one-sentence about AI.",
        }
    ],
)

print(response.choices[0].message.content)

Responses API (New Method)

# --------------------------------------------------------------
# Basic text example with the Responses API
# --------------------------------------------------------------

response = client.responses.create(
    model="gpt-4o-mini", input="Write a one-sentence about AI."
)

print(response.output_text)

Notice how the Responses API simplifies your workflow significantly.
